keywords: Introduzca palabras clave separadas por coma
alert: este filtro no puede estar vacío
title: Título
nordf: no RDF en los datos federados!
name: Nombre
datasourceError: El nombre de la Fuente de Datos ya existe
hostError: El host de la Fuente de Datos ya existe
messageDatasource: Mensaje de la Fuente de Datos
nodeSuccessfullySync: Fuente de Datos sincronizada con éxito
nodeSuccessfullyReg: Fuente de Datos registrada con éxito
defaultID: Periodo de Refresco Fuente de Datos por defecto
datasetEvaluationMeaning: The City Data Workspace implements a data evaluator that provides useful information about the dataset quality, usability and the machine readable level. The dataset evaluation is built up by 5 evaluation indexes that analyze the dataset from different perspectives
semanticDescriptionShort: This index evaluates the metadata associated to a dataset.
semanticDescription: It provides information about the completeness of the dataset in terms of metadata. In order to have an high value for this index is necessary tu fullfill the following fields: update information, temporal information, geo information, title, description, language, owner, keywords, license, website, contact.
formatDescriptionShort: This index gives information about the type and the number of resources contained in a dataset.
formatDescription2: resources classification. A dataset with multiple resources (e.g. RDF files, JSON and so on) will get an higher format level.
internationalizationDescriptionShort: This index evaluates the number of languages in which a dataset is described.
internationalizationDescription: It's even better to describe a dataset in multiple languages to improve the usability. Datasets described in English + other languages will get an higher internationalization score.
resourcesLevelDescriptionShort: This index gives information about the average of resources quality.
resourcesLevelDescription: This value is obtained checking the semantic level of a resource and his format level. In order to have an high value for this index is necessary tu fullfill the following fields for the resources: title, description, license and download URL, format.
updateDescriptionShort: This index evaluates if a dataset has an own metadata named "update frequency" and if the dataset is updated correctly.
updateDescription: If this index has 0 as value, it means that the dataset is not evaluated yet. In this case this value will not affect the overall evaluation.
evaluationProcess: How does the evaluation process works?
rangeDescription: Every index has a value in a 1-5 range. Combining these scores it's possible to assign 5 categories of evaluation
evaluationProcessDescription: Each evaluation gives users an idea of dataset quality. The evaluator checks datasets periodically, so the evaluation can change over the time.
